name: Chicken Tetrazzini
author: Shelly Dohogne
instructions: Boil chicken and cut into bite-size pieces. Cook noodles and drain. Spray 9 x 13 inch pan with Pam. Layer noodles, then chicken. Mix chicken broth and mushroom soup and then pour over chicken. Saute peppers for next layer. Top with cheese. Bake at 250° for 20 minutes or 350° for 10 minutes.
